short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Restrict access to distracting websites and limit the number of open tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension that keeps you focused on your work by blocking access to distracting websites and limiting the number of tabs you can open, or closing them all with a single click.

The blacklist mode can restrict access to any websites you want, it can be social medias or any websites that you consider non-essential to your work sessions.

You can customize your restrictions settings at any time.
